dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-chardet
dependencies.description: Universal encoding detector for Python 2 and 3

dependencies.name: py-charset-normalizer
dependencies.description:
The Real First Universal Charset Detector. Open, modern and actively
maintained alternative to Chardet.

dependencies.name: py-idna
dependencies.description: Internationalized Domain Names for Python (IDNA 2008 and UTS #46)

dependencies.name: py-urllib3
dependencies.description: HTTP library with thread-safe connection pooling, file post, and more.

dependencies.name: py-certifi
dependencies.description:
Certifi: A carefully curated collection of Root Certificates for
validating the trustworthiness of SSL certificates while verifying the
identity of TLS hosts.

dependent_to.name: py-huggingface-hub
dependent_to.description:
This library allows anyone to work with the Hub repositories: you can
clone them, create them and upload your models to them.

dependent_to.name: py-biomine
dependent_to.description: Bioinformatics data-mining.

dependent_to.name: py-multiqc
dependent_to.description:
MultiQC is a tool to aggregate bioinformatics results across many
samples into a single report. It is written in Python and contains
modules for a large number of common bioinformatics tools.

dependent_to.name: py-update-checker
dependent_to.description: A python module that will check for package updates.

dependent_to.name: py-ray
dependent_to.description:
A system for parallel and distributed Python that unifies the ML
ecosystem.

dependent_to.name: py-arcgis
dependent_to.description: ArcGIS API for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-usgs
dependent_to.description: Client library for interfacing with USGS datasets

dependent_to.name: py-poetry
dependent_to.description: Python dependency management and packaging made easy.

dependent_to.name: py-openidc-client
dependent_to.description: A python OpenID Connect client with token caching and management

dependent_to.name: py-radiant-mlhub
dependent_to.description: A Python client for Radiant MLHub.

dependent_to.name: py-plotly
dependent_to.description: An interactive, browser-based graphing library for Python

dependent_to.name: py-vcf-kit
dependent_to.description:
VCF-kit is a command-line based collection of utilities for performing
analysis on Variant Call Format (VCF) files.

dependent_to.name: py-hdfs
dependent_to.description: API and command line interface for HDFS

dependent_to.name: py-datasets
dependent_to.description:
Datasets is a lightweight library providing two main features: one-line
dataloaders for many public datasets and efficient data pre-processing.

dependent_to.name: py-nbdime
dependent_to.description: Diff and merge of Jupyter Notebooks

dependent_to.name: py-keras2onnx
dependent_to.description: Converts Machine Learning models to ONNX for use in Windows ML

dependent_to.name: py-requests-oauthlib
dependent_to.description: This project provides first-class OAuth library support for Requests.

dependent_to.name: py-keystoneauth1
dependent_to.description:
This package contains tools for authenticating to an OpenStack-based
cloud

dependent_to.name: nsimd
dependent_to.description:
NSIMD is a vectorization library that abstracts SIMD programming. It was
designed to exploit the maximum power of processors at a low development
cost.

dependent_to.name: py-pymatgen
dependent_to.description:
Python Materials Genomics is a robust materials analysis code that
defines core object representations for structures and molecules with
support for many electronic structure codes. It is currently the core
analysis code powering the Materials Project.

dependent_to.name: py-nilearn
dependent_to.description: Statistical learning for neuroimaging in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-python-fsutil
dependent_to.description: file-system utilities for lazy devs.

dependent_to.name: py-hvac
dependent_to.description: HashiCorp Vault API client

dependent_to.name: py-tqdm
dependent_to.description: A Fast, Extensible Progress Meter

dependent_to.name: py-spacy
dependent_to.description:
spaCy is a library for advanced Natural Language Processing in Python
and Cython.

dependent_to.name: charliecloud
dependent_to.description: Lightweight user-defined software stacks for HPC.

dependent_to.name: py-requests-toolbelt
dependent_to.description:
A toolbelt of useful classes and functions to be used with python-
requests

dependent_to.name: py-hepdata-validator
dependent_to.description: Validation schema and code for HEPdata submissions.

dependent_to.name: py-msal
dependent_to.description:
The Microsoft Authentication Library (MSAL) for Python library enables
your app to access the Microsoft Cloud by supporting authentication of
users with Microsoft Azure Active Directory accounts (AAD) and Microsoft
Accounts (MSA) using industry standard OAuth2 and OpenID Connect.

dependent_to.name: py-gluoncv
dependent_to.description:
GluonCV provides implementations of state-of-the-art (SOTA) deep
learning algorithms in computer vision. It aims to help engineers,
researchers, and students quickly prototype products, validate new ideas
and learn computer vision.

dependent_to.name: py-ibm-cloud-sdk-core
dependent_to.description:
This project contains core functionality required by Python code
generated by the IBM Cloud OpenAPI SDK Generator (openapi-sdkgen).

dependent_to.name: candle-benchmarks
dependent_to.description: ECP-CANDLE Benchmarks

dependent_to.name: py-sierrapy
dependent_to.description: A Client of HIVdb Sierra GraphQL Webservice

dependent_to.name: py-azureml-train-restclients-hyperdrive
dependent_to.description:
The azureml-train-restclients-hyperdrive contains functionality for
azureml-train metapackage.

dependent_to.name: py-parsl
dependent_to.description: Simple data dependent workflows in Python

dependent_to.name: py-etelemetry
dependent_to.description: A lightweight python client to communicate with the etelemetry server

dependent_to.name: py-torchtext
dependent_to.description: Text utilities and datasets for PyTorch.

dependent_to.name: py-pacifica-uploader
dependent_to.description: Python Pacifica Uploader Library

dependent_to.name: py-python-benedict
dependent_to.description:
A dict subclass with keylist/keypath support, I/O shortcuts and many
utilities.

dependent_to.name: mxnet
dependent_to.description:
MXNet is a deep learning framework designed for both efficiency and
flexibility.

dependent_to.name: py-cffconvert
dependent_to.description: Command line program to validate and convert CITATION.cff files.

dependent_to.name: py-geeadd
dependent_to.description: Google Earth Engine Batch Assets Manager with Addons.

dependent_to.name: py-moviepy
dependent_to.description:
MoviePy is a Python module for video editing, which can be used for
basic operations (like cuts, concatenations, title insertions), video
compositing (a.k.a. non-linear editing), video processing, or to create
advanced effects. It can read and write the most common video formats,
including GIF.

dependent_to.name: py-azure-keyvault
dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Key Vault Client Libraries for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-tensorflow-datasets
dependent_to.description:
tensorflow/datasets is a library of datasets ready to use with
TensorFlow.

dependent_to.name: py-projectq
dependent_to.description:
ProjectQ is an open-source software framework for quantum computing
started at ETH Zurich. It allows users to implement their quantum
programs in Python using a powerful and intuitive syntax. ProjectQ can
then translate these programs to any type of back-end, be it a simulator
run on a classical computer of an actual quantum chip.

dependent_to.name: py-sphinx
dependent_to.description: Sphinx Documentation Generator.

dependent_to.name: py-ibm-watson
dependent_to.description:
Python client library to quickly get started with the various Watson
APIs services.

dependent_to.name: py-codecov
dependent_to.description: Hosted coverage reports for Github, Bitbucket and Gitlab.

dependent_to.name: py-azure-cosmos
dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Cosmos Client Library for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-jupyterlab-server
dependent_to.description:
A set of server components for JupyterLab and JupyterLab like
applications

dependent_to.name: py-google-api-core
dependent_to.description: Google API client core library.

dependent_to.name: py-globus-sdk
dependent_to.description: Globus SDK for Python

dependent_to.name: py-dgl
dependent_to.description:
Deep Graph Library (DGL). DGL is an easy-to-use, high performance and
scalable Python package for deep learning on graphs. DGL is framework
agnostic, meaning if a deep graph model is a component of an end-to-end
application, the rest of the logics can be implemented in any major
frameworks, such as PyTorch, Apache MXNet or TensorFlow.

dependent_to.name: py-smart-open
dependent_to.description:
smart_open is a Python 2 & Python 3 library for efficient streaming of
very large files from/to S3, HDFS, WebHDFS, HTTP, or local storage. It
supports transparent, on-the-fly (de-)compression for a variety of
different formats.

dependent_to.name: py-kubernetes
dependent_to.description: Official Python client library for kubernetes.

dependent_to.name: py-torchmeta
dependent_to.description:
A collection of extensions and data-loaders for few-shot learning &
meta-learning in PyTorch. Torchmeta contains popular meta-learning
benchmarks, fully compatible with both torchvision and PyTorch's
DataLoader.

dependent_to.name: py-gee-asset-manager
dependent_to.description: Google Earth Engine Batch Asset Manager.

dependent_to.name: py-cachecontrol
dependent_to.description:
CacheControl is a port of the caching algorithms in httplib2 for use
with requests session object.

dependent_to.name: py-python-swiftclient
dependent_to.description: This is a python client for the Swift API.

dependent_to.name: py-torch-geometric
dependent_to.description:
PyTorch Geometric (PyG) is a geometric deep learning extension library
for PyTorch. It consists of various methods for deep learning on graphs
and other irregular structures, also known as geometric deep learning,
from a variety of published papers. In addition, it consists of an easy-
to-use mini-batch loader for many small and single giant graphs, multi
gpu-support, a large number of common benchmark datasets (based on
simple interfaces to create your own), and helpful transforms, both for
learning on arbitrary graphs as well as on 3D meshes or point clouds.

dependent_to.name: py-gql
dependent_to.description:
This is a GraphQL client for Python. Plays nicely with graphene,
graphql-core, graphql-js and any other GraphQL implementation compatible
with the spec. GQL architecture is inspired by React-Relay and Apollo-
Client.

dependent_to.name: py-docker
dependent_to.description: A Python library for the Docker Engine API.

dependent_to.name: py-flit
dependent_to.description: Flit is a simple way to put Python packages and modules on PyPI.

dependent_to.name: py-geeup
dependent_to.description: Simple Client for Earth Engine Uploads with Selenium Support.

dependent_to.name: py-cdsapi
dependent_to.description:
The Climate Data Store Application Program Interface is a service
providing programmatic access to CDS data. Get your UID and API key from
the CDS portal at the address https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/user and
write it into the configuration file. Look at
https://pypi.org/project/cdsapi/ for an example

dependent_to.name: py-tensorboard
dependent_to.description:
TensorBoard is a suite of web applications for inspecting and
understanding your TensorFlow runs and graphs.

dependent_to.name: py-azure-storage-common
dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Storage Common Client Library for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-duecredit
dependent_to.description: Publications (and donations) tracer.

dependent_to.name: py-requests-ftp
dependent_to.description: FTP Transport Adapter for Requests..

dependent_to.name: py-jupyterhub
dependent_to.description: Multi-user server for Jupyter notebooks.

dependent_to.name: py-requests-ntlm
dependent_to.description:
This package allows for HTTP NTLM authentication using the requests
library.

dependent_to.name: py-datalad
dependent_to.description:
data distribution geared toward scientific datasets. DataLad makes data
management and data distribution more accessible. To do that, it stands
on the shoulders of Git and Git-annex to deliver a decentralized system
for data exchange. This includes automated ingestion of data from online
portals and exposing it in readily usable form as Git(-annex)
repositories, so-called datasets. The actual data storage and permission
management, however, remains with the original data providers.

dependent_to.name: py-workload-automation
dependent_to.description:
Workload Automation (WA) is a framework for executing workloads and
collecting measurements on Android and Linux devices.

dependent_to.name: py-python-gitlab
dependent_to.description: Python wrapper for the GitLab API

dependent_to.name: py-radical-entk
dependent_to.description:
RADICAL Ensemble Toolkit is used for developing and executing large-
scale ensemble-based workflows.

dependent_to.name: py-correctionlib
dependent_to.description: A generic correction library

dependent_to.name: py-transformers
dependent_to.description:
State-of-the-art Natural Language Processing for TensorFlow 2.0 and
PyTorch

dependent_to.name: py-pyepsg
dependent_to.description: Provides simple access to https://epsg.io/.

dependent_to.name: py-apache-beam
dependent_to.description: Apache Beam is a unified programming model for Batch and Streaming.

dependent_to.name: py-azure-core
dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Core Library for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-visdom
dependent_to.description:
Visdom aims to facilitate visualization of (remote) data with an
emphasis on supporting scientific experimentation.

dependent_to.name: py-git-review
dependent_to.description: git-review is a tool that helps submitting git branches to gerrit

dependent_to.name: py-fsspec
dependent_to.description: A specification for pythonic filesystems.

dependent_to.name: py-python-jenkins
dependent_to.description: Python bindings for the remote Jenkins API

dependent_to.name: py-wradlib
dependent_to.description:
wradlib is designed to assist you in the most important steps of
processing weather radar data. These may include: reading common data
formats, georeferencing, converting reflectivity to rainfall intensity,
identifying and correcting typical error sources (such as clutter or
attenuation) and visualising the data.

dependent_to.name: py-grequests
dependent_to.description:
GRequests allows you to use Requests with Gevent to make asynchronous
HTTP Requests easily. Note: You should probably use requests-threads or
requests-futures instead.

dependent_to.name: py-azure-multiapi-storage
dependent_to.description:
Microsoft Azure Storage Client Library for Python with multi API version
support.

dependent_to.name: py-wandb
dependent_to.description: A tool for visualizing and tracking your machine learning experiments.

dependent_to.name: py-contextily
dependent_to.description: Context geo-tiles in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-mg-rast-tools
dependent_to.description:
Repository of scripts and libraries for using the MG-RAST API and MG-
RAST data.

dependent_to.name: py-pygithub
dependent_to.description: Use the full Github API v3

dependent_to.name: py-sphinxcontrib-issuetracker
dependent_to.description: Sphinx integration with different issuetrackers.

dependent_to.name: py-responses
dependent_to.description: A utility library for mocking out the `requests` Python library.

dependent_to.name: py-azure-cli-core
dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Command-Line Tools Core Module.

dependent_to.name: snakemake
dependent_to.description: Snakemake is an MIT-licensed workflow management system.

dependent_to.name: gptune
dependent_to.description:
GPTune is an autotuning framework that relies on multitask and transfer
learnings to help solve the underlying black-box optimization problem
using Bayesian optimization methodologies.

dependent_to.name: py-requests-futures
dependent_to.description: Asynchronous Python HTTP Requests for Humans using Futures

dependent_to.name: qgis
dependent_to.description:
QGIS is a free and open-source cross-platform desktop geographic
information system application that supports viewing, editing, and
analysis of geospatial data.

dependent_to.name: py-datalad-container
dependent_to.description: DataLad extension package for working with containerized environments

dependent_to.name: py-beancount
dependent_to.description:
A double-entry bookkeeping computer language that lets you define
financial transaction records in a text file, read them in memory,
generate a variety of reports from them, and provides a web interface..

dependent_to.name: py-torchvision
dependent_to.description:
The torchvision package consists of popular datasets, model
architectures, and common image transformations for computer vision.

dependent_to.name: py-templateflow
dependent_to.description: A python client to query TemplateFlow via pyBIDS.

dependent_to.name: py-oslo-config
dependent_to.description:
The Oslo configuration API supports parsing command line arguments and
.ini style configuration files.

dependent_to.name: py-bokeh
dependent_to.description: Statistical and novel interactive HTML plots for Python

dependent_to.name: py-python-keystoneclient
dependent_to.description:
This is a client for the OpenStack Identity API, implemented by the
Keystone team

dependent_to.name: py-planet
dependent_to.description: Python client library and CLI for Planet's public API

dependent_to.name: py-fastai
dependent_to.description:
You can use fastai without any installation by using Google Colab. In
fact, every page of this documentation is also available as an
interactive notebook - click "Open in colab" at the top of any page to
open it (be sure to change the Colab runtime to "GPU" to have it run
fast!) See the fast.ai documentation on Using Colab for more
information.

dependent_to.name: py-msrest
dependent_to.description: AutoRest swagger generator Python client runtime.

dependent_to.name: httpie
dependent_to.description: Modern, user-friendly command-line HTTP client for the API era.

dependent_to.name: py-owslib
dependent_to.description:
OWSLib is a Python package for client programming with Open Geospatial
Consortium (OGC) web service (hence OWS) interface standards, and their
related content models.

dependent_to.name: py-cookiecutter
dependent_to.description:
A command-line utility that creates projects from cookiecutters (project
templates). E.g. Python package projects, jQuery plugin projects.

dependent_to.name: py-pycbc
dependent_to.description:
PyCBC is a software package used to explore astrophysical sources of
gravitational waves. It contains algorithms to analyze gravitational-
wave data from the LIGO and Virgo detectors, detect coalescing compact
binaries, and measure the astrophysical parameters of detected sources.
PyCBC was used in the first direct detection of gravitational waves and
is used in the flagship analysis of LIGO and Virgo data.

dependent_to.name: py-pooch
dependent_to.description:
Pooch manages your Python library's sample data files: it automatically
downloads and stores them in a local directory, with support for
versioning and corruption checks.

dependent_to.name: py-adal
dependent_to.description:
The ADAL for Python library makes it easy for python application to
authenticate to Azure Active Directory (AAD) in order to access AAD
protected web resources. DEPRECATED: replaced by MSAL Python.

dependent_to.name: py-pipits
dependent_to.description: Automated pipeline for analyses of fungal ITS from the Illumina

dependent_to.name: py-azureml-core
dependent_to.description:
The azureml-core contains functionality for creating and managing: *
Azure Machine Learning workspaces, experiments and runs; * Machine
learning compute respources; * Models, images and web services.

dependent_to.name: reframe
dependent_to.description:
ReFrame is a framework for writing regression tests for HPC systems. The
goal of this framework is to abstract away the complexity of the
interactions with the system, separating the logic of a regression test
from the low-level details, which pertain to the system configuration
and setup. This allows users to write easily portable regression tests,
focusing only on the functionality.

dependent_to.name: py-kaggle
dependent_to.description:
Official API for https://www.kaggle.com, accessible using a command line
tool implemented in Python. Beta release - Kaggle reserves the right to
modify the API functionality currently offered.

dependent_to.name: py-getorganelle
dependent_to.description: Organelle Genome Assembly Toolkit (Chloroplast/Mitocondrial/ITS)
